terminalDistance.description: A type containing information about the distance from a terminal to a location or between two terminals, in addition the accuracy and a timestamp of the information are provided.

accuracy.description: Accuracy of the provided distance in meters

distance.description: Distance from terminal to a location or between two terminals specified in meters

nanoSeconds.description: The nanoseconds part of the time. Time is defined as Unix-time since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

seconds.description: The seconds part of the time. Time is defined as Unix-time since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.
